Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.logger

package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.logger
  • Class
    Description
    ComponentPrefixStripper
    Removes a leading textual prefix from a component while preserving formatting.
    ConsoleMessageParser
    Parses console log messages produced by MagicUtils to extract level and sub-logger prefix.
    ConsoleMessageParser.ParsedMessage
    Parsed representation of a console message.
    ExternalPlaceholderEngine
    Hook for integrating external placeholder engines.
    LogBuilderCore
    Fluent API builder for logging messages with advanced options.
    LogDispatcher
    Handles recipient selection and thread-safe delivery for logger messages.
    LoggerAdapter<P,L>
    Shared logger adapter API for platform-specific wrappers.
    LoggerCore
    Platform-agnostic logger core with configurable formatting and placeholders.
    LogLevel
    Logging levels supported by the MagicUtils logger.
    LogMessageFormatter
    Formats raw logger input into Adventure components applying placeholders, prefixes and colors.
    LogMethods
    Annotation to generate logging methods for specified log levels Similar to Lombok's @Getter but for logging methods
    LogTarget
    Target destination for log messages.
    MessageParser
    Shared helpers for parsing MiniMessage/legacy hybrid strings.
    PrefixedLoggerAdapter<P,B extends LogBuilderCore>
    Shared adapter for prefixed logger wrappers.
    PrefixedLoggerCore
    Core prefixed logger with shared formatting logic.
    PrefixMode
    Prefix display mode for log messages.
